mapper.select: select DISTINCT c1.EN_NAME as label, c1.bcch as bcch, c1.bsic as bsic from RNO_GSM_CELL c1, RNO_GSM_CELL c2 where c1.EN_NAME<>c2.EN_NAME and c1.CELL_ID <> c2.CELL_ID and c1.BCCH =c2.BCCH and c1.BSIC = c2.BSIC and c1.AREA_ID = #{cityId} and c2.AREA_ID = #{cityId} ORDER BY c1.bcch,c1.BSIC

select id,CELL_ID,NCELL_ID,CREATED_USER,CREATED_DATE,DESC_ID from RNO_GSM_NCELL_RELATION where NCELL_ID = #{sourceCell} and CELL_ID in (select CELL_ID from RNO_GSM_CELL where NCELL_ID = #{targetCell})
select id,CELL_ID,NCELL_ID,CREATED_USER,CREATED_DATE,DESC_ID from RNO_GSM_NCELL_RELATION where CELL_ID = #{sourceCell} and NCELL_ID = #{targetCell}
select wmsys.wm_concat(LONGITUDE||','||LATITUDE) as lonlats from RNO_GSM_CELL where EN_NAME = #{sourceCell} or EN_NAME = #{targetCell}
select area_id from RNO_GSM_SYS_AREA where NAME= #{areaName}

select a.id,a.name as name, to_char(a.create_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss') as createTime, b.name as areaName from RNO_GSM_CO_BSIC_DESCRIPTOR a, RNO_GSM_SYS_AREA b where a.AREA_ID = b.AREA_ID and a.id in (${ids})
